sentence: They say they serve starbucks coffee in lobby
As I had checked in online I asked for a key and was told that my iPhone worked a a key both for the elevator they had placed me in an executive floor and the room
Some of the rooms were left dirty and I waited in the hallway for 20 minutes waiting for my room to be cleaned
They have two of the elevators broken but an employee offered us to take us by the “ service elevator ” and help us to get to our floor the guy really went the extra mile
They have 3 elevators and 2 of the 3 constantly broke down the week I was there
We sat in the lobby for over an hour before Melissa thought to ask us if we wanted something to drink

The Hilton at Altamont Springs is somewhat in need of a facelift with a dreary looking exterior and some common interior areas such as the elevators and hallways that could use some updated interior decorating
Stairs not an option to go up because all locked from outside andor emergency exit only
Downstairs was a bit of an organized chaos remodeling crowded only 2 elevators that felt they took for ever
Starbucks in the lobby for a coffee to take on the road
The staff of reception was really friendly all the time we like them
This is a good Hilton with a light airy welcoming reception area
This hotel provided the best and very appropriate facilities and setting to ensure a very successful enjoyable wedding reception
Great Wedding and Reception facilities
Gym is very good all universal machines and dumbels
Pool gym and sauna were well kept with everything you need to get a complete body workout

Everything was fantastic including their Lobby Bar and breakfastAn inconvenience that I experienced was that while getting my hair done in my hotel room for my wedding the hotel had a fire alarm go off and have everyone evacuate the building
Clean Updated Rooms and great Gym with lots of weights and equipment
Great location amenities food and nice rooms
Nice welcomeing lobby easy check in with very courteous front desk staff
